translations: （使）过分生长（hypertrophy 的过去分词）

sentences.sentence: To investigate the effect of atorvastatin on gap junction remodeling in hypertrophied myocardium induced by pressure-overload.
sentences.translation: 目的探讨阿托伐他汀对心肌肥厚时缝隙连接重构的影响。

sentences.sentence: Hypertrophied myocardium is prone to proarrhythmic toxicity and development of the torsade DE points type of ventricular tachycardia.
sentences.translation: 肥厚心肌对于抗心律失常药物的致心律失常毒性非常敏感，容易发生尖端扭转型室速。

sentences.sentence: In contrast it is characterised with multi-channels and nonspecific disorder in the hypertrophied myocardium in the acquired heart disease.
sentences.translation: 而后天性心脏病的心肌肥大是多离子通道病变而非特殊性。
